Adcanny presents Plato - A Perfect & Minimal New Tab Google extension.

Features:-
1.Color match challenge game is an exciting activity that tests your visual perception and adaptability. Players are presented with a ball that changes colors as it bounces forward. Match the ball's color with the ladder's color to keep moving ahead. But beware of hitting the wrong one - a wrong move and it's game over. Test your reflexes and enjoy the experience gaming.
